alert.note: Alert for Central Cook (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 28 at 1:43PM CST until January 28 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... ...WINTER STORM WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 2 PM CST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Lake effect snow expected, mainly near the immediate lakeshore and downtown areas. Additional snow accumulations of up to one to two inches. * WHERE...Central Cook County. * WHEN...Until 6 PM CST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery, snow covered roads with impacts to the afternoon commute. Conditions will be highly variable over short distances.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Illinois can be obtained on the internet at www.gettingaroundillinois.com.
